subject: Re: Order #SSN1979, how did it go?
description_text:
Order received, I struggled a lot to keep the connection stable, disconnect
it from the usb hub, connecting it straight into the PC and connecting an
extra wire between the body of the pedal/haptic motor controller and earth
of my rig (earth) solved the issue and was much more reliable. I am using
simhub and I updated everything till the last possible upgrade.

On Fri, 25 July 2025, 2:15 pm SIMSONN, <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Andrea, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrea Ripamonti,    Thank you for your feedback. Is everything working properly now? How do you like using it? If you need any help, please feel free to contact us.
